      boolean AddAnnotAttachment(java.lang.String path, int icon, float[] rect)
      add a file as an attachment to page.
      you should re-render page to display modified data.
      this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
      this method valid in professional or premium version

    • Method Detail

      • Close

        public void Close()
        Close page object and free memory.

      • RenderPrePare

        public void RenderPrePare(int dib)
        prepare to render. it reset dib pixels to white value, and reset page status.
        Parameters:
        dib - DIB object to render. obtained by Global.dibGet().

      • Render

        public boolean Render(int dib,
             Matrix mat)
        render page to dib object. this function returned for cancelled or finished.
        before render, you need invoke RenderPrePare.
        Parameters:
        dib - DIB object to render. obtained by Global.dibGet().
        mat - Matrix object define scale, rotate, translate operations.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • RenderToBmp

        public boolean RenderToBmp(Bitmap bitmap,
                  Matrix mat)
        render page to Bitmap object directly. this function returned for cancelled or finished.
        before render, you need erase Bitmap object.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap object to render.
        mat - Matrix object define scale, rotate, translate operations.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • Render_Normal

        public void Render_Normal(int dib,
                 Matrix mat)
        render to page in normal quality
        Parameters:
        dib - same as Render function
        mat - same as Render function

      • RenderCancel

        public void RenderCancel()
        set page status to cancelled and cancel render function.

      • RenderThumb

        public boolean RenderThumb(Bitmap bmp)
        render thumb image to Bitmap object.
        the image always scale and displayed in center of Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bmp - Bitmap to render
        Returns:
        true if the page has thumb image, or false.

      • RenderIsFinished

        public boolean RenderIsFinished()
        check if page rendering is finished.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • ObjsStart

        public void ObjsStart()
        get text objects to memory.
        a standard license is needed for this method

      • ObjsGetString

        public java.lang.String ObjsGetString(int from,
                             int to)
        get string from range. this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        Parameters:
        from - 0 based unicode index.
        to - 0 based unicode index.
        Returns:
        string or null.

      • ObjsAlignWord

        public int ObjsAlignWord(int from,
                int dir)
        get index aligned by word. this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        Parameters:
        from - 0 based unicode index.
        dir - if dir < 0, get start index of the word. otherwise get last index of the word.
        Returns:
        new index value.

      • ObjsGetCharRect

        public void ObjsGetCharRect(int index,
                   float[] vals)
        get char's box in PDF coordinate system, this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        Parameters:
        index - 0 based unicode index.
        vals - return 4 elements for PDF rectangle.

      • ObjsGetCharFontName

        public java.lang.String ObjsGetCharFontName(int index)
        get char's font name. this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        Parameters:
        index - 0 based unicode index.
        Returns:
        font name, may be null.

      • ObjsGetCharCount

        public int ObjsGetCharCount()
        get chars count in this page. this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        a standard license is needed for this method
        Returns:
        count or 0 if ObjsStart not invoked.

      • ObjsGetCharIndex

        public int ObjsGetCharIndex(float[] pt)
        get char index nearest to point
        Parameters:
        pt - point as [x,y] in PDF coordinate.
        Returns:
        char index or -1 failed.

      • FindOpen

        public Page.Finder FindOpen(java.lang.String str,
                   boolean match_case,
                   boolean whole_word)
        create a find session. this can be invoked after ObjsStart
        Parameters:
        str - key string to find.
        match_case - match case?
        whole_word - match whole word?
        Returns:
        handle of find session, or 0 if no found.

        get rotate degree for page, example: 0 or 90
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Returns:
        count

      • GetAnnot

        public Page.Annotation GetAnnot(int index)
        get annotations by index.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        index - 0 based index value. range:[0, GetAnnotCount()-1]
        Returns:
        handle of annotation, valid until Close invoked.

      • GetAnnotFromPoint

        public Page.Annotation GetAnnotFromPoint(float x,
                                float y)
        get annotations by PDF point.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        x - x value in PDF coordinate system.
        y - y value in PDF coordinate system.
        Returns:
        handle of annotation, valid until Close invoked.

      • AddAnnotGoto

        public boolean AddAnnotGoto(float[] rect,
                   int pageno,
                   float top)
        add goto-page link to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        rect - link area rect [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate.
        pageno - 0 based pageno to goto.
        top - y coordinate in PDF coordinate, page.height is top of page. and 0 is bottom of page.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotURI

        public boolean AddAnnotURI(float[] rect,
                  java.lang.String uri)
        add URL link to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        rect - link area rect [left, top, right, bottom] in PDF coordinate.
        uri - url address, example: "http://www.radaee.com/en"
        Returns:
        true or false

      • AddAnnotInk

        public boolean AddAnnotInk(Matrix mat,
                  Ink ink,
                  float orgx,
                  float orgy)
        add hand-writing to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        ink - Ink object
        orgx - origin x coordinate in page. in DIB coordinate system
        orgy - origin y coordinate in page. in DIB coordinate system
        Returns:
        true or false

                       HWriting hwriting,
                       float orgx,
                       float orgy)

        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.

      • AddAnnotGlyph

        public boolean AddAnnotGlyph(Matrix mat,
                    Path path,
                    int color,
                    boolean winding)
        add a user-defined glyph to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        path - Path object.
        color - text color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        winding - if true, using winding fill rule, otherwise using odd-even fill rule.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotRect

        public boolean AddAnnotRect(Matrix mat,
                   float[] rect,
                   float width,
                   int color,
                   int fill_color)
        add rectangle to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        rect - 4 elements for left, top, right, bottom in DIB coordinate system
        width - line width
        color - rectangle color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB
        fill_color - fill color in rectangle, formated as 0xAARRGGBB, if alpha channel is 0, means no fill operation, otherwise alpha channel are ignored.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • AddAnnotLine

        public boolean AddAnnotLine(Matrix mat,
                   float[] pt1,
                   float[] pt2,
                   int style1,
                   int style2,
                   float width,
                   int color,
                   int fill_color)
        add line to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        pt1 - start point, 2 elements for x,y
        pt2 - end point, 2 elements for x,y
        style1 - style for start point:
        0: None
        1: Arrow
        2: Closed Arrow
        3: Square
        4: Circle
        5: Butt
        6: Diamond
        7: Reverted Arrow
        8: Reverted Closed Arrow
        9: Slash
        style2 - style for end point, values are same as style1.
        width - line width in DIB coordinate
        color - line color. same as addAnnotRect.
        fill_color - fill color. same as addAnnotRect.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotEllipse

        public boolean AddAnnotEllipse(Matrix mat,
                      float[] rect,
                      float width,
                      int color,
                      int fill_color)
        add ellipse to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        rect - 4 elements for left, top, right, bottom in DIB coordinate system
        width - line width
        color - ellipse color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB
        fill_color - fill color in ellipse, formated as 0xAARRGGBB, if alpha channel is 0, means no fill operation, otherwise alpha channel are ignored.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • AddAnnotMarkup

        public boolean AddAnnotMarkup(Matrix mat,
                     float[] rects,
                     int type)
        add a text-markup annotation to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        mat - Matrix for Render function.
        rects - 4 * n rectangles, each 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in DIB coordinate system. n is decided by length of array.
        type - 0: Highlight, 1: Underline, 2: StrikeOut, 3: Highlight without round corner.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotInk

        public boolean AddAnnotInk(Ink ink)
        add hand-writing to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        ink - Ink object in PDF coordinate.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotLine

        public boolean AddAnnotLine(float[] pt1,
                   float[] pt2,
                   int style1,
                   int style2,
                   float width,
                   int color,
                   int icolor)
        add line to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        pt1 - start point in PDF coordinate, 2 elements for x,y
        pt2 - end point in PDF coordinate, 2 elements for x,y
        style1 - style for start point:
        0: None
        1: Arrow
        2: Closed Arrow
        3: Square
        4: Circle
        5: Butt
        6: Diamond
        7: Reverted Arrow
        8: Reverted Closed Arrow
        9: Slash
        style2 - style for end point, values are same as style1.
        width - line width in DIB coordinate
        color - line color. same as addAnnotRect.
        fill_color - fill color. same as addAnnotRect.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotRect

        public boolean AddAnnotRect(float[] rect,
                   float width,
                   int color,
                   int fill_color)
        add rectangle to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        rect - 4 elements for left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system
        width - line width in PDF coordinate.
        color - rectangle color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB
        fill_color - fill color in rectangle, formated as 0xAARRGGBB, if alpha channel is 0, means no fill operation, otherwise alpha channel are ignored.
        Returns:
        true or false

        Parameters:

        width - line width in PDF coordinate

        fill_color - fill color in ellipse, formated as 0xAARRGGBB, if alpha channel is 0, means no fill operation, otherwise alpha channel are ignored.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • AddAnnotEditbox

        public boolean AddAnnotEditbox(float[] rect,
                      float tsize,
                      int color)
        add an edit-box on page. the edit-box has no border and background. the font of edit box is set by Global.setTextFont in Global.Init(). this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in premium version.
        Parameters:
        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system.
        tsize - text size in DIB coordinate system.
        color - text color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        Returns:

      • AddAnnotPolygon

        public boolean AddAnnotPolygon(Path path,
                      int color,
                      int fill_color,
                      float width)
        add polygon to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        path - must be a closed contour.
        color - stroke color formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        fill_color - fill color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB. if AA == 0, no fill operations, otherwise alpha value is same to stroke color.
        width - stroke width in PDF coordinate
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotPolyline

        public boolean AddAnnotPolyline(Path path,
                       int style1,
                       int style2,
                       int color,
                       int fill_color,
                       float width)
        add polyline to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        path - must be a set of unclosed lines. do not container any move-to operation except the first point in the path.
        style1 - style for start point:
        0: None
        1: Arrow
        2: Closed Arrow
        3: Square
        4: Circle
        5: Butt
        6: Diamond
        7: Reverted Arrow
        8: Reverted Closed Arrow
        9: Slash
        style2 - style for end point, values are same as style1.
        color - stroke color formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        fill_color - fill color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB. if AA == 0, no fill operations, otherwise alpha value is same to stroke color.
        width - stroke width in PDF coordinate
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotMarkup

        public boolean AddAnnotMarkup(int cindex1,
                     int cindex2,
                     int type)
        add a text-markup annotation to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be only invoked after ObjsStart.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        cindex1 - first char index
        cindex2 - second char index
        type - type as following:
        0: Highlight
        1: Underline
        2: StrikeOut
        3: Highlight without round corner
        4: Squiggly underline.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotBitmap

        public boolean AddAnnotBitmap(Bitmap bitmap,
                     boolean has_alpha,
                     float[] rect)
        add a bitmap object as an annotation to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        bitmap - Bitmap object to add, which should be formated in ARGB_8888
        has_alpha - is need to save alpha channel information?
        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotAttachment

        public boolean AddAnnotAttachment(java.lang.String path,
                         int icon,
                         float[] rect)
        add a file as an attachment to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        path - absolute path name to the file.
        icon - icon display to the page. values as:
        0: PushPin
        1: Graph
        2: Paperclip
        3: Tag
        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in PDF coordinate system.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotText

        public boolean AddAnnotText(float[] pt)
        add a sticky text annotation to page.
        you should re-render page to display modified data.
        this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        pt - 2 elements: x, y in PDF coordinate system.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • AddAnnotEditbox

        public boolean AddAnnotEditbox(Matrix mat,
                      float[] rect,
                      float tsize,
                      int color)
        add an edit-box on page. the edit-box has no border and background. the font of edit box is set by Global.setTextFont in Global.Init(). this can be invoked after ObjsStart or Render or RenderToBmp.
        this method valid in premium version.
        Parameters:
        matrix - Matrix object that passed to Render or RenderToBmp function.
        rect - 4 elements: left, top, right, bottom in DIB coordinate system.
        tsize - text size in DIB coordinate system.
        color - text color, formated as 0xAARRGGBB.
        Returns:

      • ReflowStart

        public float ReflowStart(float width,
                float scale)
        Start Reflow.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        width - input width, function calculate height.
        scale - scale base to 72 DPI, 2.0 means 144 DPI. the reflowed text will displayed in scale
        Returns:
        the height that reflow needed.

                       int ichar)

        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        iparagraph - paragraph index range[0, ReflowGetParaCount()-1]
        ichar - char index range[0, ReflowGetCharCount()]
        Returns:
        font width for this char

      • ReflowGetCharColor

        public int ReflowGetCharColor(int iparagraph,
                     int ichar)
        get char's fill color for display.
        this method valid in professional or premium version
        Parameters:
        iparagraph - paragraph index range[0, ReflowGetParaCount()-1]
        ichar - char index range[0, ReflowGetCharCount()]
        Returns:
        color value formatted 0xAARRGGBB, AA: alpha value, RR:red, GG:green, BB:blue
